newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY NOON RADIO HEADLINES - MAY 8.

text.p: These are the main headlines on Hungary's Kossuth Radio midday news. Reuters cannot vouch for their accuracy:
- Opposition parties the Hungarian Democratic Forum and the Christian Democratic Peoples' Party have denied the two parties will merge but said the two parliamentary factions may work together.

- The mayor of the Romanian city of Cluj, which has a large Hungarian population and used to belong to Hungary before World War One, has protested against the forthcoming visit by Hungarian president Arpad Goncz, calling it a "humiliation" of the Romanians living in the city.
